author: chris-dollin
msg: The toString purge is complete for the moment; code either uses
getLexicalForm() or is prepared to cope with a datatype string.

author: chris-dollin
msg: replaced use of toString with getLexicalForm (for literals) and getURIString
(for URIs). This meant adding the latter to the URI and URIReference classes.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added the Command interface to .shared, and then extended Transaction-
